name: TheatreScript
body:
### Welcome to the home of TheatreScript.
This project is still under heavy development. At this stage, you can use it for fairly advanced animations, however you will need to manually do many things (such as tweening). Feel free to give it a try out!

### Documentation
Documentation is auto-generated from JSDoc3; included with the source code. (Looking for a better template!)
[See the documentation](Docs/index.html)

### Samples
[Flying boxes sample](Samples/flying_box.html)

### Authors and Contributors
TheatreScript was conceived by Jason Parrott aka @Moncader

### Support or Contact
For now, since TheatreScript is under very heavy development, please do not send any bug reports as I know things are broken and will work on constantly improving TheatreScript.
tagline: An animation library for modern browsers and smartphones.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
